definition: a piece of cloth that is left over after the rest has been used or sold, sell cheaply as remainders
details:
noun
- a piece of cloth that is left over after the rest has been used or sold
= synonyms: end
- the number that remains after subtraction
= synonyms: difference
- the part of the dividend that is left over when the dividend is not evenly divisible by the divisor
- something left after other parts have been taken away
= example: something left after other parts have been taken away
= synonyms: residual
verb
- sell cheaply as remainders
= example: sell cheaply as remainders
